alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 4:57PM EDT until August 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Northwestern Emanuel County in east central Georgia... Southeastern Washington County in east central Georgia... Johnson County in east central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Donovan, or near Wrightsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wrightsville, Tennille, Adrian, Harrison, Oconee, Riddleville, Kite, Spann, Donovan, Tuckers Crossroad, Pringle, Lovett, Norristown Junction, New Home, Meeks, Brewton, and Scott. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
